newsArray.title: How India can reach WTC Final: Win at SCG and hope for Sri Lankan series victory or draw against Australia
newsArray.description: To qualify for the final, India must win the last Test of the series against Australia at Sydney, and then hope for a positive result for Sri Lanka (or a 0-0 draw) when Australia tour the island nation early next year.
